title: Is independent internet access possible? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unlikely. Getting access to the Internet Back Bone is very difficult. Most of the infrastructure is OWNED by a monopoly. To access you need to get to a super node then have the equipment to interface to it and make it intelligible for you to use. You wont just plug in a Ethernet cable to connect. You will need routers, and modems, probably Media converters if it is Fiber. If you are persistent try this
